website_summaries.verdict: If you can't stand slippery changing pads that just won't stay in place, this is the one for you.
pros: Heavy-duty non-slip rubber strips provide superior grip even on slick surfaces
Smooth, water-resistant outer cover prevents seepage
Large size leaves ample room for little ones to grow
cons: Finding a cover that doesn't overlap the non-skid grips can be difficult

customer_reviews.title: Reaks of sting chemicals
customer_reviews.text: Smells so strongly of chemicals the entire nursery smells of it now. Sitting outside in the sun for a few days to try and get rid of that. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I converted an old dresser and this pad fits it perfect the non slip pads on the bottom held it in place very well and I love that there are two straps to attach to the back of the dresser. It's doesn't move!
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4

customer_reviews.title: making it very easy to clean and sanitize (not sure why so many ...
customer_reviews.text: The biggest deciding factor for me in selecting this changing pad is that the cover is solid, making it very easy to clean and sanitize (not sure why so many other brands have designs in which poop/pee can more easily be trapped).
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Su

customer_reviews.title: so highly recommend this one as it had a smooth surface which ...
customer_reviews.text: Had the summer infant changing pad which is cheaper than this one, but that one has little holes in the surface which you can't clean! And sooner or later, poop will get on the changing pad, so highly recommend this one as it had a smooth surface which is easily cleanable.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: returned. better quality elsewhere. terrible outgass smell
customer_reviews.text: cheap plastic. terrible outgassing smell not the best quality foam.
customer_reviews.author: Willows' wishlist

customer_reviews.title: Best pad out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the best little diaper changing pad out there in my opinion. This is our second purchase as we also got one with my son and they work fabulous. The grip feet actually grip even with a cover on and the sides prevent rolling.
customer_reviews.author: DaniCs

customer_reviews.title: Baby has an accident while changing? No problem!
customer_reviews.text: Why it was so hard for me to find a waterproof changing pad is beyond me!? We went through 2 other pads in less than 2 weeks, because our daughter decided to pee when we were changing her diaper. The style we had before, would just soak up the urine and there was NO way to clean it... YUCK! This is the only way to go. They pee, you wipe and sanitize and you're good to go. Thank you for using common sense and making a waterproof product :) Signed: All Parents
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This changing mat is exactly what you would expect. It's a normal size, does not have an off-putting or plastic smell, and the grips are okay. I don't have an actual changing table with the rail that holds the pad in place, so I wanted a pad with grips to offset any movement. These grips work ok, but it does still slid a tad with a cover on, but it's manageable. A normal sized changing cover fits fine without covering the grips. This pad also has the safety belt to secure the baby and fabric bits to anchor the pad to the dresser with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Kryssy

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Had one of these purchased at target for my son. Just had my daughter ordered this for her room. Works well babies dont seem to mind them. We currently use both in our house one with a 3 week old and one with an 11 month old. Wipes clean. I use a cover that is washable. Fits on top my sons dresser. My daughter has a changing table top dresser fits in there as well. The grips on the bottom do not do much...this is the only downfall.
customer_reviews.author: Veronicarae666

customer_reviews.title: Second one and love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a different brand and ended up returning it and buying this. We got this for Baby #2 since we had this for our first child. We still have the first one and are still using it after over a year. It's very durable and easy to wipe clean for those newborn blowouts. The grips on the bottom help it stay in place, although the bigger your baby gets, it can move around a bit. Fits perfect on top of the dresser without needing the frame. Would definitely buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Crista C.

customer_reviews.title: Best diaper changing pad on the market
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t have enough space for a changing table so I turned the top of a cabinet into one. I needed a diaper changing pad that wouldn’t slide around since the cabinet was slimmer than most changing table. That is why I bought this. It is one of the best baby purchases I made. This thing is perfect and I love the size. Baby feels secure on it and now that he is more mobile I am enjoying the straps. All changing pad covers I have bought fit on it. I even put a wool pad and a bassinet sheet on it and used it as a cosleeper at a friends house.
customer_reviews.author: StarSculptress

customer_reviews.title: Great Changing Pad
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad is thick and durable. It is super easy to wipe down, which is nice because we can never keep a cover on it (baby seems to like to poop on them!) This changing pad works great anywhere- on a table, floor, etc. It's got a sturdy base and raised edges. The grips on the bottom keep it from sliding around on the table, although I would still be careful when your baby is bigger (and buckled in) that they might be able to flip the changing pad over. For the price it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaina Rose

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly fits the Babyletto changing table
customer_reviews.text: The changing pad perfectly fits the Babyletto changing table. It also comes with its own safety straps for the baby. Quality is solid and it really helps that the material is waterproof, as accidents do happen. My baby seems to like the firmness of the pad and is content to lie on it as I’m changing her.
customer_reviews.author: Oxana

customer_reviews.title: Why was it so difficult to find a changing mat without the embroidered designs?
customer_reviews.text: Prepping for second baby and needed a new changing pad. Specifically looked for changing pad without embroidered designs because those little designs are poop magnets and reservoirs and they drive me nuts during cleaning. I just don't understand why any manufacturer would do this to their product. I know people like to purchase cute changing pad covers to protect the pad, but I don't see the need for this extra expense for most. With second baby, I specifically sought out a pad without the design. (I didn't know any better with the first baby.) This changing pad was reasonably priced so I bought it and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyne

customer_reviews.title: awful smell
customer_reviews.text: This product smells like chemicals. I am not sure why, have ordered changing mats before and never smelled like this. I will not lay my baby on something that smells this strong even after airing out all day.
customer_reviews.author: Kels

customer_reviews.title: Terrible smell don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I received this yesterday and the smell of this mattress is just unbearable I don't know why other people hasn't commented on this and has good reviews. But the smell is like gasoline I don't know it is just terrible it smells toxic. I thought at first was the packaging but is not. I don't recommend this product specially for a baby. It is made with polivynil chloride 100 percent. My whole house smells like this now is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: - The kids seem comfortable - Poop stains. I rub it with a wipe immediately and it still takes a while to come out. In general, it gets dirty. And since it’s white, I really care that it stay clean. This is an annoying problem; I don’t want something that requires such maintenance. I also don’t trust that this is actually waterproof, considering that it gets stained so easily. - The material looks like it’ll rip as soon as it’s caught on anything remotely sharp or pointy.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Quet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad works perfectly and is easy to clean. I didn’t want to buy a whole changing station so I purchased this and nailed it to the top of a small dresser. It works perfectly for a changing station and can easily be removed without ruining the dresser. It’s easy to wipe clean and lightweight. I like the straps on each side as an added measure of safety. Standard changing pad sheets/covers fit perfectly, just make sure to buy them with the holes to pull the straps through.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: This changing pad cover is so easy to clean. Just wipe with a damp cloth. No cracks or holes for messes to leak into such as other brands. It has a secure belt and grippers on the bottom to keep it from sliding. Will buy this brand again when needed.
customer_reviews.author: rsmithski

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic changing pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic changing pad. It has 2 furniture attachment straps (a must for safety, in my opinion) and slip resistant feet. It’s waterproof with no little crevices for anything to get stuck in if it needs to be wiped down. I bought a different kind at first, but it only had one furniture strap and was not as secure. I HIGHLY recommend this changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great at 7 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Been using this every day for past 7 weeks & it works great. However, I don't have a changing table or topper frame, so I somewhat rely on the grippy feet on the bottom, which means I haven't been able to use any cute covers because the cover sheets go over the grippy feet. Instead I've just used it bare and put a waterproof pad on top that I can easily swap out if it gets wet or soiled.
customer_reviews.author: JustSayin'

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & Efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Like many first time moms, I read so many reviews on everything I bought and got so overwhelmed. This changing pad is perfectly great and all you need! It's comfortable for baby boy, he actually enjoys laying on it and suits the purpose well! I've only had it 2 mos so I can't speak too well to the durability, though it's held up perfectly well thus far!
customer_reviews.author: Rahshea Cardiff

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I like it. At the beginning was some bad smell, but not any more. Few days and the odor is gone. It's easy to clean, just with a wet wipes. It's very soft too.
customer_reviews.author: Mihail Mahe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, needs to be screwed into furniture to be secured though!
customer_reviews.text: This item seems to be great quality and easy to clean! It works fine for the purposes I need... The “secure grips” however do not stop this from sliding up and down any surface we have tried it on. That being said, there are straps and screws included so that you can screw this into whatever surface you plan to sit it on; to keep it secure.... which works fine for me, but if you are banking on the grips keeping the pad from sliding on their own, you may be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mickayla R.

customer_reviews.title: the pad itself is not bad, but I give 3 starts because of odor
customer_reviews.text: the pad itself is not bad, but I give 3 starts because of odor. Plastic, chemical smell, my whole nursery stinks now. I thought it will air out, but week passed and it still stinks so bad, even if I put cover on top, now cover stinks too, I will have to get a new pad, cannot let my newborn inhale all those chemicals, especially when he will be laying on it. It's just really unbearable smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nataliia C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go on top of the dresser in the nursery and the most appealing thing about this product was the grippers on the bottom. It also has two safety straps you can screw into the dresser as well. The pad is very cushioned and is great quality for the price. I love it and can't wait to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect, but not quite
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this would have been perfect, but the non-skid backing on the bottom is partially covered by the changing pad cover because the slip resistant pads were made too close to the outer four corners. Kind of defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: CH-1138

customer_reviews.title: We use it many times every day
customer_reviews.text: It is very convenient to have it in the bedroom. It's easy to clean and so far(we are 1 month old right now) it is safe to have the baby inside. Before the umbilical cord was off, it was also used for the bath. It's a little bit cold for the baby to lie on it. We found that if you put a blanket on top of it the baby will be less fussy.
customer_reviews.author: qas

customer_reviews.title: Grippers work like a dream
customer_reviews.text: We love this thing! We have 2 of these and one is a different brand; This one (with the grippers) is our favorite! We bought covers for them, but ended up just using them plain - way easier to clean that way.
customer_reviews.author: Liberty Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go on top of our sons dresser. We love it! It is so easy to just put him on this and get him changed really quick. I could not imagine having any other way to change him. Its firm but comfy for his changing and I gave him sponge baths on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: EASY to CLEAN.
customer_reviews.text: The most important feature of a diaper changing pad is its ease of cleaning. Five stars for that ! It does not have the design and thus the grooves for baby poop and other gross stuff to get stuck. Easy to wipe down. I returned another product but love this one.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: The grips on the bottom are excellent and you can secure them even more with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've bought two of these already one for myself and another for our church. The grips on the bottom are excellent and you can secure them even more with the screws it brings to screw on the changing table. Plastic is sturdy and all the covers I have gotten have fit extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: LuliluTraveler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, ignore the crazies and buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Same pad Target sells. Some of the crazies on here complain about off-gassing. That is a non-issue, some people are just born complainers. Keeps the baby safe from rolling off, is plenty long, soft enough for the baby to be comfortable, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Winter

customer_reviews.title: No cracks for pee to seep into!! Does not stink!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted that this has no holes. It's solid. Seems to be holding up, but time will tell. It's soft and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Tellme Truth

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like this changing pad because it is super easy to clean. There are no holes like I saw in other models, so whenever the baby has an inevitable blowout I can just wash this down with soap and water without worrying about it getting funky
customer_reviews.author: Camille D.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: We have used this over a year and it still looks brand new. Durable and easy to clean. Great comfortable changing pad. The grippy feet on the bottom are what attracted me to buying this pad over others. It has never slipped off the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Drake

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof! Perfect for twins! Pee/poop can’t get inside.
customer_reviews.text: I have twins and so far this one has been my favorite one it did cost more than the other brand I bought but did not last so I decided this time to get this one instead. I regret not getting it earlier! This one has no little holes like the other one I had so pee and poop can’t inside.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Grips on bottom are useless
customer_reviews.text: I love this diaper changer EXCEPT for the grippys on the bottom: they’re useless when you have a cover on top (which who doesn’t?) The covers are fitted sheets that go right over the grips on the bottom corners and there’s nothing in the middle to counteract that, so that part is pretty pointless. I think I’ll put some hot glue across the whole bottom to add some extra grip.
customer_reviews.author: mrougeaux

customer_reviews.title: Sticky grips don't actually stick
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that the sticky grips literally stuck to the dresser to keep it in place. Unfortunately, the grips don't really do any good; however, the fact that it is screwed into the dresser keeps it from sliding. Otherwise, it's exactly what we needed and we are happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Luna & Family

customer_reviews.title: I love this changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: I converted our low dresser into a changing table with this changing pad. I love the high sides and it is super easy to clean and it stays put very well under the weight of my baby. My baby is over a year now and I use the pad for every change and it is still in great condition. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: A changing pad is a changing pad is a changing pad. Except when the padding wears out in a month or 2. This cushion has a lot of support but I really like the no slide grips on the bottom of the pad. Even though the changing table has a bar to hold the pad and baby on the table these little grips just add a little more peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Smooth = easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Finally a smooth changer pad. Easy to. Clean vs all the other ones that are textured.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Havent had the baby yet so might write another soon. So far it seems great. I tried moving it around on the changing table i bought, and it barely moved. It seems pretty soft. It does have a plastic smell but i think thats just because its new and i dont really care? I dont understand why a few people on bere are super sensitive about it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: On baby registry
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon because it was listed on a friend's baby registry. In the past I purchased a different brand pad for another friend that was slightly more expensive but that I thought was of better material, however it didn't have the grippers on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Ardis C.

customer_reviews.title: Best Changing Pad Out There
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad. It’s not porous at all, meaning that if your baby pees/poops on it, nothing gets stuck in the pad itself and it’s super easy to clean with just a quick wipe down. We use ours bare, without changing covers to keep cleanup super easy. The only downside with this method is that our newborn doesn’t seem to like the cold vinyl on his bare skin.
customer_reviews.author: Keibs

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this changing pad. It has nice tall sides to make it easier to keep baby from falling. It cleans up very easily as well and the quality is great. If you are looking for a nice changing pad then this is it
customer_reviews.author: MommyOfFive💙

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait to use this when our baby arrive. The product seems durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Samirah Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality !
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! This is for my coming baby 👶 my friend told this is very useful for changing dippers. The product is stick enough and very light. It also have a belt for the baby 👶 looks very nice 👍 .
customer_reviews.author: Meiling Jin

customer_reviews.title: Good changing pad for daily use
customer_reviews.text: The product is soft, lightweight and easy to clean. It does everything it says but reason I give it 4 stars is because for last few days I noticed that it started to curve inside and doesn’t hold its shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Don't get liners or sheets otherwise the clean up becomes more difficult. The changing pad is super easy to wipe down and may be cold to touch for baby but what infant likes being changed in the first place?
customer_reviews.author: Joe Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality - not cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! So good my mom bought one for her house. Large but firm and comfy for baby. Has grips on bottom although they are just alright. Has nice cushioning. Tight fit in IKEA gulliver changing table but works better than others. Really great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Love this changing pad! We have been taking it in the car when we travel since it is lightweight and waterproof and it has worked perfectly for us. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: caron.elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Stable n secure that baby cannot roll over. Good quality, has good cushioning. Quite big in size. I do not encounter the “bad plastic smell” others stated. Have to be careful if water pools on it as it cannot drain.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about a year ago. Our daughter is 11 months now and the pad is still holding up and has not had any indents from constant use. Still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Amarie

customer_reviews.title: Fun changing tablet
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves laying on this changing tablet. He rocks himself and giggles from the light noise the pad makes, which is actually quiet to me. Cleans easily and packs up easily. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BookBroad

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof is the only way to go!
customer_reviews.text: After many diaper changing mishaps, we love that it’s easy to wipe down. I love the curved edges to prevent rolling off, we have yet to use the straps as she’s not rolling yet. The grips underneath keep the mat in place on our changing table. Good buy for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Shields

customer_reviews.title: The grips on the back really work well. Have ...
customer_reviews.text: The grips on the back really work well. Have not had is slip off the dresser at all. We didn't buy the dresser top that keeps the changing pad in place and that is why I bought this particular one.
customer_reviews.author: Linz01

customer_reviews.title: Love the grippers!
customer_reviews.text: This is your basic changing pad with a twist! The grippers on the bottom keep it from sliding around. This allows you to use it on any smooth surface. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This is great! I took away a star because of the plastic smell it arrives with. However, after 2 day it was gone!! It's nicely padded, has good grips on the bottom to prevent sliding, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this product. The grips on the back are helpful in keeping the pad from slipping but do not completely stop slipping. It is decently soft and fits all of my covers. Overall a good changing pad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: We really like this changing pad, but unfortunately the grips on the bottom don’t do a whole lot to prevent slipping around until the baby is on the pad. It is so light that it slips around a fair amount on our dresser. We will use the mounts that are attached and it shouldn’t be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: While the grip feet on the back may be a nice quality to have
customer_reviews.text: I returned this. While the grip feet on the back may be a nice quality to have, the pad itself was very hard and crinkly, and not at all what I expected. I ended up going with another quilted quality brand that has the straps to directly attach to the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this!
customer_reviews.text: Bottom of changing pad has grips so the pad will stay in place. Also water proof! So easy to clean. Changing pad is also thick so it is comfy for baby. We have one for the nursery but will definitely buy another for downstairs. This is a great buy! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, fits a 1 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Switched my daughter from a changing table she grew out of to this changing pad, which I placed on top of her dresser. It seems very comfy for her and she still has room for her to grow. I love the bottom grips it does not move at all when changing her, however, I do have cloth material like dresser which helps with friction.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My son is 15 months now and we still use it. We moved it to the floor and sometimes use on the bed since it isnt safe for such a large kids on the changing table. He moves too much. It has not ripped. I clean it with disinfectant wipes too.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Great changing pad and was easily moveable to where ever we needed to use it as the baby grew before it came stationary to the diaper table
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lieske

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean. Nice and Comfy for Baby
customer_reviews.text: I do not use a cover or protector on it but baby still finds it comfy. It’s super easy to clean if any bodily fluids get on it and it does not stain.
customer_reviews.author: Pat S.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this purchase, sheets fit this well. Easy to clean. Would purchase for other ppl. Exactly as shown in picture when purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: charlene

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: We love this changing pad. We thought we may need to purchase a cover for this, but there is no need. It wipes clean! Super easy to clean and it's comfortable enough for our little one.
customer_reviews.author: grlf1xr

customer_reviews.title: Great changing pad
customer_reviews.text: Very nice changing pad. The only downfall is it's too long to fit on my changing table that is attached to the crib. But it covers the edge of the crib so she doesnt hit her had on it so I guess it worked out!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: These changing pads are double the price from other retailers and this one is just as good as any others I've seen. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: FLWHIT

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an easy to clean pad that does not slide and this is it ! Thank yuh for a great product that does not break the bank
customer_reviews.author: Nadia doumler

customer_reviews.title: Stays secure!
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Includes safety belt and option to screw it onto a changing table. I just use this pad on top of a dresser or on my bed. I love it because it doesn’t slip or move around.
customer_reviews.author: Marina M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully made product
customer_reviews.text: Will be using it when my son’s born. I love how soft and well made it is. Thank you so much. It’s a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nekey

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Practical
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the changing table. I was hesitant about some saying there was a bad chemical smell, but I am happy to tell you that mine had no bad smell at all. You could use this without a cover, but the warning sticker is located on the front. Thankfully I accidentally bought bassinet sheets, which fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ceci135

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Wrapped in a white waterproof fabric, so that easy to clean! It’s soft, yet durable! I would buy one again from this company, if need be!
customer_reviews.author: Amber McCrea

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfy! This is the second one of these I have purchased. The first I still use for my oldest that is 3. It is holding up great and have nothing but good things to say
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so well designed you can use it without a cover. I still bought one but I probably didn’t need to!
customer_reviews.author: PhDmom

customer_reviews.title: Priced right and well made
customer_reviews.text: We have a cover on this so I can’t speak to it’s waterproof claim however we are very pleased with the size and quality. It was easy to secure to the dresser we are using and is a perfect fit at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: NTreesh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: I will see how it will be after a month using it but by the look of it out of the box, it should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well - the changing pad sides are fairly rigid which keeps my grandson from rolling off the pad. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Loves To Read

customer_reviews.title: We Love This & Baby Does Too.
customer_reviews.text: This pad is easy to clean, doesn't slide is seems to be comfortable. We use a fitted cover over the plastic and our baby seems to love it. She often stops crying as soon as she's placed on it and seems fine to just lie on it at times.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up to replace the thin pad that came with the changing table. This is well made and is so much better then what we had. Fits changing table and the molded shape is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mollys Mom

customer_reviews.title: STINKS, LITERALLY
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst smelling thing I've brought into my house. And that's saying a lot, I have a husband, two dogs, and a 3 month old. I have no idea what it is about this mat that smells, but it's now in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley R.

customer_reviews.title: I keep buying more of these.
customer_reviews.text: I have five of these around my house, they are great on all types of surfaces. They have held up through my 22 month old daughter, into my newborn. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Barash

customer_reviews.title: Perfect changing pad!
customer_reviews.text: Great changing pad. I looked at several changing pads, ones with the stitching, the peanut, etc but glad I went with this one. For the price it does just what you need, the grips are nice so it doesn’t slide around. I put the BlueSnail changing pad mat over it with no sheet and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole G

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It had a funny smell, not the tipical of new plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Loriente ELio

customer_reviews.title: Its a bad plastic odor that I don't like at all
customer_reviews.text: I only give 3 stars because of the odor of the changing pad. I hope after keeping it out of the package the smell will go away soon. Its a bad plastic odor that I don't like at all... Over wise its very lightweight, and the grip straps kind of secures it to the dresser but not very much.
customer_reviews.author: Rainmonda

customer_reviews.title: Great grips and soft changing pad.
customer_reviews.text: Simple changing pad but the rubber grips on the bottom are perfect! I have this ontop of a dresser and it’s perfect it doesnt Move at all when taking the baby on or off.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsti

customer_reviews.title: Good idea in theory but when you put a changing ...
customer_reviews.text: Good idea in theory but when you put a changing pad cover on it the grips don't work anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley Hallmark

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. Smooth finish is good - you don’t want a pattern or texture where your baby is dropping off dooks while pissing themselves
customer_reviews.author: Tino Bear Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This pad is exactly as described and fits perfectly on top of the dresser that will serve as a changing table, removing the need for a separate piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: sharon mckee

customer_reviews.title: Grip sucks
customer_reviews.text: 1 star off cause the grip doesn’t really stay put. It moves around easily in the changing table.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Tran

customer_reviews.title: So worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two! One for my moms house and one for our nursery. I use it without a cover though.
customer_reviews.author: SoCha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this changing pad to change our daughter's diaper throughout the house. The quality is great, easy to clean and lightweight to carry but sturdy enough to hold our baby in place comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ldygenia

customer_reviews.title: Simple to clean.  Does not slide easily.
customer_reviews.text: Other brands I have used like the summer infant pad have slid badly. The feet on this model really do grip well, even with a cover. I also like the smooth surface as compared Summer infant changing pad. It is much easier to wipe down when the inevitable happens and seems more waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and fits are changing table perfectly. Only downfall is it is plastic so if you don’t have a cover on it the baby lays on cold plastic cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dont like about it is it's almost 6 inches smaller than the table...it was in the recommended buy for the table, but it's not the same size, make sure to check your dimensions! I love the rubber grips on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: For an item that gets crapped on it’s easy to clean the kid seem comfortable happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Bacer

customer_reviews.title: The grips are nice, and seem relatively sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you're planning to put a cute cover on it, to match your nursery etc. beware that it fits kind of frumpy-like since the belt is attached too close to the edge for the fitted sheet to tuck evenly. The grips are nice, and seem relatively sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Neese

product_meta.title: Munchkin Secure Grip Waterproof Diaper Changing Pad, 16" x 31"
product_meta.description: If only your baby would stay still during diaper changes...well we know that never happens. Keep them comfy and safe with the Secure Grip Changing Pad. Featuring Xtra Grip rubber strips and safety straps that buckle, the Secure Grip Changing Pad stays in place during diaper changes and helps keep your little one safe as they squirm, wiggle and twist. And for those moments you need additional stability, fabric straps with screws are included to securely attach to your dresser or changing table. Plus, the soft contoured cushion is made of waterproof fabric that is easy to clean.
feature_bullets: Xtra grip strips keep pad in place
Safety straps and contoured sides keep baby secure
Easy wipe surface for cleaning up messes
Fits most dressers and changing tables, product measures 16 inches by 31 inches
Meets all safety regulations. Material - polyurethane Foam

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars2,234 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
